name: Barred Fang Stance
desc: Your blade is as capable as any shield, deflecting blows time and time again.
accumulate: Once per _Round_, gain 2 _Momentum_ when an Attack is a _Graze_- and you used a _Parry_ that requires a Bladed Weapon.
effect: When you use a _Parry_ that uses a _Bladed_, on a _Hit_+ on the Attack Roll gain 1 _Guard_ against the triggering Attack.
special: Treat your Bladeds' _Speed_ as 1 lower for determining penalties to the Attack Roll in _Parry_ Maneuvers.

name: Blurring Raven Stance
desc: Your thrown weapons fly out with incredible speed, constantly catching foes off-guard.
accumulate: Once per _Round_, gain 2 _Momentum_ when you _Hit_+ with a _Thrown_ Weapon against a creature that has not yet taken a _Turn_ this _Round_.
effect: Add _Fluid_ 1 and _Priority_ to all _Techniques_ that Attack using a _Thrown_ Weapon. Additionally, at _Refresh_ gain 1 _Charge_ of _Sentry's Throw_.
special: While using this _Style_, reduce the _Cost_ of the _Retrieve_ Reaction by 1 when using it on _Thrown_ Weapons.

name: Bristling Quill Stance
desc: Your lance whips around as a thorny spine, piercing any who get too close.
accumulate: Once per _Round_, gain 2 _Momentum_ when you _Hit_+ with a _Punish_ using a _Pole_ Weapon.
effect: The _Opportunity Attack_ Reaction also has the Trigger 'An enemy _Shifts_ out of a space within your _Reach_'. When used in this way, the _Opportunity Attack_ Reaction must be made with the Pole Weapon who's _Reach_ triggered it.

name: Brutal Stag Stance
desc: You make use of your sturdy armor to lash out at foes, using your gauntlets as artificial weapons.
accumulate: Once per _Round_, gain 2 _Momentum_ when you deal at least 4 Damage with an _Unarmed_ Attack.
effect: On a _Graze_+ with an _Unarmed_ Weapon add _Push_ 1 and deal +1 Damage. On a _Crit_ with an _Unarmed_ Weapon, add _Prone_ and increase the cost to _Negate_ by 1.

name: Catalpa Guard Stance
desc: Your shield seems to always find itself into the optimal spot, warding you at all times and driving foes back.
accumulate: Once per _Round_, gain 2 _Grit_/_Momentum_ when the target of your _Raise Guard_ gets a _Hit_+ with an Attack.
effect: At the start of each _Phase_ you may change the target of _Raise Guard_.
special: The Imbue of _Raise Guard_ has no cost for you.

name: Clay Shaper Stance
desc: You shape earth and stone as easily as clay, manipulating the field around them to their liking.
accumulate: Once per _Round_, gain 2 _Momentum_ when you change the _Terrain_ in an occupied _Earthen_ space.
effect: At Refresh, choose 2 contiguous, unoccupied _Earthen_ spaces within Range 4. Either add _Rough_, remove all _Earthen_ Terrain, make sides of your choice _Climable_, or make one side _Stairs_. You may apply a different effect to each space.
special: You may ignore _Earthen_ Terrain while in this Stance.

name: Colossus Plate Stance
desc: You specializes in heavy armor made of stone, limiting mobility but providing unparalleled defense.
accumulate: At _Refresh_, gain 2 _Grit_ if you have _Stone Armor_.
effect: While you have _Stone Armor_, deal 1 additional _Damage_ with _Unarmed_ Strikes and reduce all _Forced Movement_ by 2. Additionally, increase the _Durability_ of your _Stone Armor_ by 1.
special: At _Refresh_, if you do not have _Stone Armor_, you may use the _Imbue_ of _Stoneguard_ for no cost.

name: Crashing Stone Stance
desc: You are a true master of boulder-based combat, forming them and flinging them with brutal efficiency.
accumulate: Once per _Round_, gain 2 _Momentum_ when you deal Damage with a _Boulder_.
effect: You may use the _Compact_ Maneuver at _Refresh_ for no _Cost_.
special: Reduce the _Grit_ cost of all _Interacts_ with _Boulder_s by 1. All _Boulder_ _Interacts_ deal +1 Damage.

name: Crushing Paw Stance
desc: You specialize in punishing foes in armor, not only shattering their defenses but also crumpling it in a painful way.
accumulate: Once per _Round_, gain 2 _Momentum_ when you Attack a creature's _Armor_ or reduce _Armor_'s _Durability_ to 0.
effect: Whenever you reduce _Armor_'s _Guard_ with a Hafted Weapon also inflict _Wounded_ 2 (2 _Grit_) on the creature.

name: Cunning Raven Stance
desc: Your throws bounce unnaturally, bending to find a foe.
accumulate: Once per _Round_, when you Attack with a _Thrown_ Weapon and end your _Turn_ _Wielding_ the same Weapon, gain 2 _Momentum_.
effect: After Attacking with a _Thrown_ Weapon, you may place it anywhere within 3 spaces of the Target, rather than in an adjacent space. If the Weapon ends in your space, you may immediately _Wield_ it.
special: While using this _Style_, reduce the _Cost_ of the _Retrieve_ Reaction by 1 when using it on _Thrown_ Weapons.

name: Harrying Quill Stance
desc: Your lance is a tool, acting as a powerful pivot across the battlefield.
accumulate: Once per _Round_, gain 2 _Momentum_ you _Hit_+ against an enemy adjacent to an ally.
effect: Whenever you _Hit_+ with a Pole Weapon you may choose to _Gift_ an ally adjacent to the enemy 1 _Momentum_.

name: Dancing Fang Stance
desc: You move with fluid, savage grace, weaving an elegant duet with your blade.
accumulate: Once per _Round_, gain 2 _Momentum_ when you Attack a creature with a Bladed that you didn't start your _Turn_ within a _Wielded_ Bladed's _Reach_ of, and end your _Turn_ outside of the same _Reach_.
effect: Whenever you _Graze_+ with a Bladed Weapon your remaining Movement gains _Safe_ 1.
special: Whenever you _Hit_+ with a Bladed Weapon, you may deal Damage to a different creature within _Reach_ as if you rolled a 4. They may Negate with 1 _Reflex_ to take no Damage.

name: Darting Grasshopper Stance
desc: You agilely leap about the battlefield, swiftly covering ground.
accumulate: Once per _Round_, if you make a _Jump_ of 4 or more spaces, gain 2 _Momentum_.
effect: Increase your _Jump Value_ by 1. While _Leaping_, all _Melee_ Attacks against you take a -1 Penalty.
special: Once per _Jump_ you may change directions.

name: Defiant Antlion Stance
desc: With your mix of mobility and armor you aggressively counter all assaults.
accumulate: Once per _Round_, gain 3 _Momentum_ when you _Counter_ a creature you have _Marked_.
effect: Whenever a creature you have _Marked_ makes an Attack that doesn't include you as a Target, gain a +1 Bonus to all Attack Rolls against them until the end of the _Round_.
special: Once per _Round_, you may reduce the Cost of a _Counter_ by up to 3. After resolving the _Counter_, gain an _Exposed_ Token of the same value.

name: Destructive Paw Stance
desc: The limitations of the battlefield are more like guidelines for you.
accumulate: Once per _Round_, gain 2 _/Grit_/_Momentum_ when you _Destroy_ an _Obstacle_.
effect: Whenever you _Destroy_ an _Obstacle_ with a Hafted Weapon you may immediately inflict 2 Damage, _Vulnerable_ 2 (2 _Reflex_) on a creature adjacent to the Obstacle. Negating halves the Damage.
special: You attacks with Hafted _Weapons_ are never _Glancing_ against _Obstacles_; instead, resolve them as a normal Attack.

name: Driving Paw Stance
desc: Your weapons carry more weight than most, something you can use to great effect.
accumulate: Once per _Round_, gain 2 _Momentum_ when you knock a foe _Prone_ or into an _Obstacle_ with _Forceful_ _Push_.
effect: All _Forceful_ _Push_ you do with a Hafted Weapon deals +1 Damage when triggered. In addition, when you push a creature into another creature with _Forceful_ _Push_ you may choose to resolve the effect against both of them as if they were _Forceful_ _Pushed_ into an _Obstacle_, but deal half Damage.

name: Emperor's Phalanx Stance
desc: A fighting style centered around the use of a shield to defend oneself and others.
accumulate: Once per _Round_, gain 2 _Grit_/_Momentum_ when you use _Vigilant Defender_.
effect: Adjacent allies may treat you as a Size 1 Obstacle for the purposes of _Cover_.
special: After using _Vigilant Defender_ you may swap spaces with your ally if they are adjacent to you, adding _Safe_ 1. Automatically apply the _Maneuver_ used with _Vigilant Defender_ to any _Punishes_ used against this Movement.

name: Floating Butterfly Stance
desc: You have honed your defenses to work while wearing no armor, dodging attacks by a razor-thin margin.
effect: Whenever you use an _Evade_ Maneuver, after resolving all Effects, you may _Shift_ 1 without provoking _Punishes_.
special: The first Attack against you in a _Round_ takes a -1 Penalty.

name: Ironclad Guard Stance
desc: You are an expert at making maximum use of your armor, deflecting more blows than most.
accumulate: Once per _Round_, gain 2 _Momentum_ when a creature deals 0 Damage on a _Graze_+ against you.
effect: Whenever an Attack is a _Graze_-, treat your _Armor's_ _Guard_ as 1 higher. If an Attack does 0 Damage, reduce the cost to _Negate_ by 1.

name: Keen Raven Stance
desc: You throw weapons with pinpoint accuracy, embedding them in your foes in debilitating ways.
accumulate: Once per _Round_, when you _Embed_ with a _Thrown_ Weapon, gain 2 _Momentum_.
effect: Add _Embed_ on a _Hit_+ with all _Thrown_ Weapons. If the Attack already has _Embed_, instead add _Wounded_ 1.
special: While using this _Style_, reduce the _Cost_ of the _Retrieve_ Stunt by 1 when using it on _Thrown_ Weapons.

name: Piercing Shard Stance
desc: Stone can cut and pierce as well as metal in the right hands, an art that you have practiced well.
accumulate: Once per _Round_, gain 2 _Momentum_ when a creature takes Damage from a _Spire_ or _Jagged_ Terrain on your _Turn_, or a creature in a _Jagged_ space takes Damage.
effect: At _Refresh_, choose 2 contiguous, unoccupied _Earthen_ spaces within Range 4. You may make them _Jagged_.
special: _Spire_s and _Jagged_ Terrain within Range 3 of you deal +1 Damage. Creatures in _Jagged_ spaces in the same radius take +1 Damage from all sources.

name: Quaking Earth Stance
desc: The ground around those that have mastered the Roiling Stance is nearly a liquid, quaking and shaking constantly.
accumulate: Once per _Round_, gain 2 _Momentum_ when you knock a creature _Prone_ that is within the Area of _Localized Tremor_.
effect: You may use _Localized Tremor_ each _Phase_ at no _Cost_.

name: Rising Fortress Stance
desc: You construct an unassailable fortress of earth and stone, making it almost impossible for foes to approach.
accumulate: Gain 1 _Grit_ whenever you start your _Turn_ adjacent to an _Earthen_ _Obstacle_ of at least Size 1.
effect: At _Refresh_ you may place an _Earth Pillar_ in an adjacent _Earthen_ space. While you are adjacent to them, _Earthen_ Obstacles of your choice are _Sturdy_.
special: While using this _Stance_, gain 1 _Charge_ of _Earthen Aegis_ at _Refresh_ if you have none.

name: Sanguine Fang Stance
desc: Your weapon is a vicious blur, striking deep as it draws blood.
accumulate: Once per _Round_, gain 2 _Momentum_ when you increase a _Wounded_ Token to 3.
effect: Whenever you would inflict _Wounded_ with a Bladed Weapon you may choose to increase the creature's existing _Wounded_ Tokens by a total Value equal to the _Wounded_ that would be inflicted, distributed as you wish.

name: Shielded Devil Stance
desc: Your shield is a vicious weapon, one that you're easily able to weave into strikes.
accumulate: Once per _Round_, on a Hit+ with a _Punish_ Attack using a Shield gain 2 _Momentum_.
effect: You may use the _Opportunity Attack_ Reaction against any creature that moves within your Shield's _Reach_, but must use the _Shield Bash_ Technique in conjunction with it.
special: Deal +1 damage with your Shield on a _Hit_+.

name: Stabbing Quill Stance
desc: Your lance is a deadly point, piercing through foes with uncanny aim.
accumulate: Once per _Round_, gain 2 _Momentum_ when you _Graze_+ two or more creatures with a single Pole Weapon Attack.
effect: Whenever you make a Single-Target Attack with a Pole Weapon, resolve the Attack as _Glancing_ against another creature within _Reach_ that is in a straight line with you and the original Target.
special: When attacking a non-adjacent creature with your Pole Weapon, add _Pierce_ 1.

name: Tumbling Armadillo Stance
desc: You roll with a swift, practiced grace, making it simple for you to avoid foes.
accumulate: Once per _Round_, gain 2 _Momentum_ when you _Roll_ through a hostile creature's space.
effect: While in this Stance you may remove _Prone_ with only one space of Movement, and you have 1 additional _Guard_ while _Rolling_.
special: You may trigger _Reactions_ as if you were not _Prone_ while in this _Stance_.

name: Unstoppable Rhino Stance
desc: You rely on the weight of your armor to carry you forward, making it impossible to stop your motion and causing feeble conditions to glance off.
accumulate: Once per _Round_, gain 2 _Momentum_ when you move through at least two occupied spaces in the same _Turn_ with a _Shift_ that has the _Rush_ keyword.
effect: Deal 2 Damage every time you move through a creature's space with _Rush_ Movement.
special: You may use _Purge Afflictions_ at the beginning of your _Turn_, but must only remove _Hobbled_. Additionally, reduce all _Forced Movement_ effects by 1.

name: Vicious Wasp Stance
desc: You move with every strike, weaving in an out to strike foes.
accumulate: Once per _Round_, gain 2 _Momentum_ when you hit a creature with a _Counter_ that you didn't start the _Phase_ adjacent to.
effect: Whenever you _Graze_+ with a _Punish_ or _Counter_ you may _Shift_ 2, adding _Safe_ 1 on a _Hit_ or _Safe_ 2 on a _Crit_.

name: Waiting Mantis Stance
desc: You patiently wait for an opening, using it at the opportune moment to strike.
accumulate: Once per _Round_, gain 2 _Momentum_ when you _Hit_+ against a creature you have _Insight_ on.
effect: Whenever an Attack is a _Graze_- against you, inflict _Insight_ 1 (1 _Focus_) on the attacker.
special: After a creature Attacks you, gain a +1 Bonus to all Attack Rolls as a part of a _Counter_ or _Punish_ against them until the end of the Round.
